Title: Relates to epinephrine auto-injectors in schools
Summary: Requires epinephrine auto-injectors in schools; requires training in the administration of epi-pens where a student is reasonably believed to be suffering from anaphylaxis.
LawCode: Add ยง3000-cc, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to epinephrine auto-injectors in schools
